title: OPPO Reno 7 series is launching in India this week
content:
In November last year, OPPO unveiled the Reno 7 series, consisting of the Reno 7, Reno 7 Pro, and Reno 7 SE. At the time, the new lineup was limited to the Chinese market, with no word on subsequent global availability. That changes today as the Chinese smartphone maker has now confirmed that it’s bringing

The post OPPO Reno 7 series is launching in India this week appeared first on xda-developers.
description: OPPO India today revealed that the Reno 7 series is launching in India in early February. The launch event will take place on February 4.
